lenders.name: Moses
lenders.loan_because:
My name is Arinaitwe Moses. I am male, Ugandan by nationality and 26
years of age. I am a born again Christian by faith and have recently
graduated from Ggaba Bible Institute in Kampala, Uganda, with a degree
in theology. As an answer to my pastoral call, I have decided to
establish a church to extend and expand the kingdom of Jesus Christ
the Lord to my remote home area of Hoima in the mid-western part of
Uganda. I have a great desire to be a mouth piece and channel of Jesus
Christ in reaching these people and areas of western Uganda with the
good news of Jesus Christ the Lord as a laborer in His vineyard.

In order to sustain myself and my family, I desire to create a
business where I would buy and sell maize and beans.  I need
$600 to establish and begin this business venture. My mission is to
buy the products at a fair price so that my suppliers may also gain a
decent profit. I hope to create a great future for my family and the
community at large.  With the profits from my business, I hope to
start a program to help orphans and those in need. Eventually, I’d
like to have a big store where I can put these goods for resale.

I have a passion for Uganda (Africa) to be lifted out of its poverty
because by way of experience, I know what it means to live without.

lenders.name: Jeff

lenders.occupational_info: I work with other devoted employees who believe their social mission is to help the members of our Credit Union attain better financial peace

lenders.occupational_info: I help develop medicine to treat people with cancer.  I dothis through my writing.  I help plan out the studies (tests) of the drug to make sure it is safe and works, then I help write up everything that happened in the test and send it to the government group that approves drugs for use in each country.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm in university studying History and Criminal Justice.

lenders.name: Bonney B
lenders.loan_because: I have had many blessings and opportunities in my life...how could I not share with those who did not receive as much?
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large Catholic university,  providing services to graduate business students. For 30 years, I have also worked part-time as a support partner for developmentally disabled adults.

lenders.name: David & Natalie
lenders.loan_because: This can make a difference.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.occupation: Single Mommy of twins & hitech marketing manager
lenders.loan_because: To whom much has been given, much will be required; and from whom much has been entrusted, even more will be demanded. I have been blest with more than most and would like to extend my blessings.

lenders.name: Lotte
lenders.loan_because: a small amount of money can make a big difference
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children with visual and mental disabilities

lenders.name: m.ilyewren
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Many of the good things in my own life have come from the kindness of others. In my travels, I have seen how far money can go to make a real difference and how hard people will work for it.  I believe the world is made better by putting resources to filling needs before wants.
lenders.occupational_info: I take pictures of plants, animals, and people.  I am inspired by sunlight.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: i can
lenders.occupational_info: i work in advertising

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and everything I have is because of Him, I am just trying to be fruitful.  Investing in these individuals and groups will give a better return than investing in myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I help raise money for Habitat for Humanity affiliates so they can build more homes and provide home ownership opportunities for families that would not be able to own their own home otherwise.

lenders.name: BOB
lenders.loan_because: I ESPECIALLY LIKE THE REGENERATING ASPECT OF THE KIVA PROGRAM
lenders.occupational_info: I HELP PEOPLE RESTORE THE ARCHITECTURAL BEAUTY OF THEIR PREVIOUSLY "REMUDDLED" 1920s AND 1930s PERIOD REVIVAL HOMES

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.occupation: Engineer, Husband, Dad, Citizen of the World

lenders.name: Carli
lenders.loan_because: I was born with a great deal of luck in this world.  I have a roof over my head, food to eat at night, and the opportunity to do great things with the education I was blessed to be able to get.  It is the right thing for me to share my luck in life with others that have not received the same that I have.

lenders.name: CostaSunglasses
lenders.occupational_info: Sunglasses that deliver the ultimate performance. A need to explore. A responsibility to protect the planet. These are the things we live for and the adventures that drive us.

lenders.name: Biren
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage entrepreneur spirit. It would also give me a lot of satisfaction if a small financial help from me could make a positive and sustaining difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Miriam
lenders.loan_because: every person deserves to make her/his life a rich and rewarding one. I want my kids to realize the impact one person can make by giving to another. As Ghandi said, "be the change you want to see in the world."
lenders.occupational_info: I teach drama and dance to young children.

lenders.name: Karin and Giles
lenders.loan_because:
We can.
With much regret, because Kiva insists on continuing to support loans for blood sport enterprises, we are withdrawing our funds as quickly as  they are repaid.  We are redirecting all of our loans to www.energyincommon.org, which doesn't mock our ethical principles.
lenders.occupational_info: Becoming philanthropists -- using more conscionable means than Kiva

lenders.name: Jesus
lenders.whereabouts: It's a big big house With lots and lots of room
lenders.loan_because: I believe everone should have a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I died on the cross for your sin.

lenders.name: Zephyr
lenders.loan_because: it is a personal way to do good - to help those who really need and want to improve their own situation! I admire all micro-entrepreneurs who apply for Kiva-loans!

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps Volunteer in the late 70's and it gave me a great appreciation for what we have been blessed with.  I have had many opportunities and this is a way to pay them forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people that work with computers.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help a little.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because:
I view the money I will lend the same way as any object or thing I own which I'm not using right now.
If I don't need it right now - why shouldn't someone else who has a need for it, get use out of it. I'm not using it right now anyway, it's just sitting here doing nothing. It's a no-brainer.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I believe that I am called to help my brothers and sister  on this earth whenever I can.   Working with Kiva is a pleasure and a joy knowing I can help others achieve more for their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I pastor a church - I preach and teach God's word and I try to love others in the way Jesus would.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: It's important to give the less fortunate a chance to take care of themselves and have pride in who they are, especially woman who are often widowed or alone raising families. I also wish to loan to those who are very close to reaching their requested loan amount so that I can add to them reaching their goal.

lenders.name: chadrick
lenders.loan_because: This is how the  men of the pass made there money.
lenders.occupational_info: this is a good way to make money.

lenders.name: Anna Ruth
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in college

lenders.name: Cole
lenders.loan_because: I need to learn to manage my money by also giving it away to people who need it more than I do.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: We are all successful due in large part to those who stopped and took the time to help.  KIVA is one opportunity to repay some of the help/support I have received in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social worker and have worked in healthcare - particularly  hospice - for many years.
